30095-30099 |area_code = 470/678/770/404 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 13-24600 |blank1_name = GNIS feature ID |blank1_info = 2403514 |website = |footnotes = }} Duluth is a city in Gwinnett County, Georgia, United States. It is a suburb of Atlanta. As of the 2020 census, Duluth had a population of 31,873. Forbes ranked Duluth 26th in "America's Best Places to Move" in 2009. ==References== Category:Cities in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Gwinnett County, Georgia
